thread.title: 2015 Texas Filmmaker of the Year, Brett Bentman, Directs His Second Film in Texas and Puts the First Twenty Minutes Online, for Free

author: cbs8
title: 2015 Texas Filmmaker of the Year, Brett Bentman, Directs His Second Film in Texas and Puts the First Twenty Minutes Online, for Free
text:
Dark Water Productions
In the upcoming film, "Pale", two sisters become separated after a post-apocalyptic depression. The movie is the third feature film written by award winning Texas based writer/director Brett Bentman, and his second film as Director.
LOS ANGELES , Oct. 5, Brett Bentman's previous work include "Element" with Michael Ironside and "Kreep" starring Judd Nelson , Lymari Nadal and Charles Baker .
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151005/273765
"Pale" stars Katie Kohler and Ashlyn McEvers as two sisters ( Natalie and Sarah West ) and Nellie Sciutto from the box office hit, "Shutter Island." Rounding out the cast is Lance De Los Santos , Todd Jenkins , Ben Rigsby , Billy Blair , Tom Zembrod , Tiffany Heath and Bill Nicholas .
"Pale is organic. I'm taking film making back to the basics; lights, cameras and action. No gimmicks. Just talented people who share my vision for a script I adore," said Brett at a recent film festival in Austin, TX.
Pale is currently filming in Dallas/Fort Worth with Circus Wheel Productions and Turtle Moon Films producing. Production is expected to be completed in January of 2016, with a projected release date of April 2016 .
Writer: Patti Tripp
Dark Water Productions
Watch the first twenty minutes of Pale on Vimeo: https://vimeo.com/137973131
Pale Official Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Palemovie
Pale Official IMDB: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt4815204/?ref_=ttfc_fc_tt
